title: Gabriel Wibmer’s Gravel Mania is What Happens When Gravel Bike Meets Bike Park
content:
Gabriel Wibmer certainly isn’t the first person to push the limits of a gravel bike, but he may be one of the most stylish. His latest edit, appropriately called Gravel Mania, sees Gabriel absolutely sending his Canyon Grizl down some big terrain. This is proof that gravel bikes are probably more capable than you give them credit for. It’s also proof that the right rider can do almost anything on any bike.

The post Gabriel Wibmer’s Gravel Mania is What Happens When Gravel Bike Meets Bike Park appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
